mapper.select: select count(shipping_cost_entry_serial) from m_shipping_cost_entry where checkout_date = date('now', 'localtime')

select shipping_cost_entry_serial, s.partner_company_id, c.abbreviated_name as company_abbreviated_name, c.full_name as company_full_name, c.phone as company_phone, is_tax_deduction, invoice_number, total_amount, invoice_amount, shipping_payment_type, s.remark, drawer, creation_date, checkout_date, in_or_out, invoice_date, is_modified from m_shipping_cost_entry as s join c_partner_company as c on s.partner_company_id = c.partner_company_id where s.checkout_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate}

select shipping_cost_entry_serial, s.partner_company_id, c.abbreviated_name as company_abbreviated_name, c.full_name as company_full_name, c.phone as company_phone, is_tax_deduction, invoice_number, total_amount, invoice_amount, shipping_payment_type, s.remark, drawer, creation_date, checkout_date, in_or_out, invoice_date, is_modified from m_shipping_cost_entry as s join c_partner_company as c on s.partner_company_id = c.partner_company_id where s.shipping_cost_entry_serial = #{shippingCostEntrySerial}
mapper.update: update m_shipping_cost_entry set partner_company_id = #{partnerCompanyID}, is_tax_deduction = #{isTaxDeduction}, total_amount = #{totalAmount}, invoice_number = #{invoiceNumber}, invoice_amount = #{invoiceAmount}, invoice_date = #{invoiceDate}, shipping_payment_type = #{shippingPaymentType}, remark = #{remark}, is_modified = 1 where shipping_cost_entry_serial = #{shippingCostEntrySerial}
